snippet: One of the arts of defense is trying to make declarer think you hold one hand when you actually have something very different.
abstract: Phillip Alder Bridge column on deal played at the final of the open teams between Poland and Sweden at the World Mind Sports Games in France.
lead_paragraph: One of the arts of defense is trying to make declarer think you hold one hand when you actually have something very different.
